page.title: 08PORTHMADOG HEALTH SERVICES
page.content: The{Madoc Memorial Hospital}-12 beds- provides the following sevices: casualty & X-ray depts., diognostic facilities,operating theatre for minor surgery carried out by visiting surgeons,G.P.beds for patients requiring post-operative care,or convalescing and needing nursing care. The following{clinics}are held in Porthmadog:antenatal,postnatal,infant welfare,chiropody,cytology,psychiatry, speech therapy,blood pressure,cervical smear. There are 3{doctors}in general practice and a school medical officer. There are 2{dentists}in joint practice There are community nurses,midwives & health vistors. There are 2 dispensing{chemists}and an {optician}in the area. There are 2 private nursing homes.
